A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I wanted to love this movie badly\, but poor character develop\, plot holes\, and pointless side stories as filler makes me borderline hate this movie. I have loved Star Wars since I was a little kid and this movie was almost as bad as “Attack of the Clones”. Hopefully JJ Abrams will wrap the series nicely\, but I’m not holding my breath after this one.
